Articles.Content: Once you've unlocked the resource scanner & have scanned a body for resources, will KerbNet show resource abundance for a given location?
I think I read something to that effect in one of the recent dev notes. It may require you to have the narrow band scanner aboard though.

I saw in one of the streams that there are buttons in Kerbnet in top left corner that switch the view between heightmap and biome map. Probably, when you have Narrow Band Scanner, there is a third icon, to show resources. 

EDIT:

And a confirmation from one of the developers:
